extendedInfo.description: Tweet questions, compliments, complaints and support requests @nycmateUPDATED APPLICATIONThe wait is over!! We have been hard at work here at Densebrain and we are so excited to release our newest update to NYCMate. Below are all the updates and new features we've added for version 4.0: â¢ New Official Maps with Timetables: Metro North, Long Island Rail Road, and New Jersey Transitâ¢ the Official PATH train mapâ¢ Service Alert and Push Notifications: Receive alerts for the specific train lines you need to know aboutâ¢ Customizable Toolbar: Put your most important maps right in front of you.NYCMate is the ultimate companion for commuters, tourists, and city dwellers on the go. It has everything you need to get in, out, or around the city. You can access all NYC major subway, bus and commuter transit system maps and timetables offline and underground, when you need it most. Let NYCMate be your guide to the ever confusing New York City transit system. Be sure to download maps before you go underground or out of a service area! We are releasing new cities soon, including Boston and ChicagoNYCMate includes the crowd sourcing system NextTrain, which provides realtime train arrival information on all NYC subway lines. NextTrain is an innovative technical product and proud to be a NYC homegrown technical solution. NextTrain uses anonymous and passive reporting, so their is nothing for you the user to do. Just enjoy finally knowing when the train will arrive. But only if enough people enable NextTrain, so visit the information button in the app and enable today.

reviews.title: Train Times & Alerts no longer work
What The Hell Happened?
reviews.comment: This was the best all in one app for info & maps for the NYC MTA. Now the notifications are cap and haven\'t updated since February. Get it together ya\'ll.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good Idea but Nothing Loads
reviews.comment: None of the features work and I tried installing this twice already. I am using a Samsung Galaxy S3. Every station says No Times To Show and the service alerts stall out and do not download. Ok if you just want to look at maps but you can easily just download the PDF maps and it wouldn\'t be any different.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: How The Mighty Fall :(
reviews.comment: I like many others used this app for the train schedules, but they were removed and then included and finally removed again. This is too bad for the app, but honestly I don\'t even use it anymore unless I really need a map, which isn\'t often. This used to be a great application, but since the best feature was removed it has fallen into the abyss. Thankfully the MTA is alright with their schedule displays so one doesn\'t have to rely on this as much.  Avoid!!
reviews.author: Fleece Beast

reviews.title: Focus more in Android!
reviews.comment: Instead of firing the folks from Episode6 who are genuine Android experts maybe you should try to devote some resources on improving your android app. Until then I\'ll use the more stable \"NYC bus and subway map\" app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No Android update, freeze
reviews.comment: Why pay if you\'re not updating. Would be nice to be able to click on bus line to get accurate bus schedule times too!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work after update
reviews.comment: I was so excited about this app. I d. ownloaded and it worked for the subway times then came the update. Now it does not work. It does not give bus times and it does not zoom enough to see the streets. It could be good it they would fix it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work since the update
reviews.comment: I\'ve had this app for years and it worked perfectly. Providing several maps and train schedules. Now it offers nothing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Once again...
reviews.comment: This app had lost the subway times AGAIN! How does that keep happening? It\'s no better then a pdf of a subway map at this point.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No longer worth the download
reviews.comment: Was an excellent app, what happened? It\'s just useful for the subway map, and for that would rather look at a pdf or jpg on my phone than this app. Uninstalling though I used to rave about this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful and full featured
reviews.comment: Used this on my recent trip to the city, works perfectly. Could run slightly smoother/ batch map download option would be great too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This app is great! It usually has the times that the trains are running. It has service alerts and all of the trains and buses. it\'s awesome! It\'s a little hard to get used to in the beginning knowing what to push to get what you want but you learn :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: \"No times to show\"
reviews.comment: ? Pointless now. Only great part about this one is the HQ bus/train maps for each borough.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Upset!
reviews.comment: My last rating was excellent for this app but now it sucks badly. It doesn\'t even work anymore, shows nothing but the map, no train times. I really want to uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used to be great...
reviews.comment: Was an awesome app because it gave me upcoming subway schedule while I was underground. Now there have been no times to show for months. Still a great MTA map to have because you can zoom in but please fix the times.
reviews.author: Natalie Fleysher

reviews.title: An \"Ok\" app
reviews.comment: When viewing bus routes, there should be a way to zoom in closer to see the streets & avenues.  Everything is so tiny...its easy to spend 10 minutes trying to figure out where the bus route takes you.  Needs work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This is my favourite app! Not only do you have various maps for all of nyc, but time tables for the next arriving train!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: time table back
reviews.comment: 1/1/12: need time table to get 5 stars back  2/9/12: thanks for bringing back the time table. 11/19/12: reinstalled app but lost   time table. please send batch update
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No more schedules
reviews.comment: Not sure what\'s going on... Used to love this app,  but now it\'s no longer displaying train schedules.   Please fix it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: failed me
reviews.comment: NOT RELIABLE. it missed a planned service change today, one that\'s on the website and has probably been up for days.  I had to take a cab. switched to NYC Bus and Subway Maps.
reviews.author: A Google User
